text: akaso ane dharatini dareka vastu allahani maliki hethala ja che, tamara hrdayomam je kami pana che tene tame jahera karo athava to chupavo allaha ta'ala teno hisaba tamari pasethi lese, pachi jene icche tene mapha kari de ane jene icche yatana ape, ane allaha ta'ala dareka vastu para sakti dharave che
